conversations.content: Reload the Rift Arc session and log that we're resuming the ripple study.

tool_call: memoryManager_loadSession
arguments: {"context": {"sessionId": "session_1731105320789_f55cc2ae1", "workspaceId": "ws_1731105120789_336779b7e", "sessionDescription": "Resume Rift Arc", "sessionMemory": "session_1732000000459_856f2969e paused at dusk", "toolContext": "Load session", "primaryGoal": "Load session_1732000000459_856f2969e", "subgoal": "Continue ripple study"}, "sessionId": "session_1732000000459_856f2969e"}

Dark mode and CSV export leading customer requests.", "activeTask": "Finalize Q1 2026 feature selection (need 5-7 more features)"}, "workspaceContext": {"workspaceId": "ws_1731052000000_r0adm4p1q", "workspacePath": ["Roadmap"], "activeWorkspace": true}}

Looking at your roadmap workspace, Q4 is 85% complete (6/8 features shipped). For Q1, you have capacity for 8-10 features but only 3 drafted so far. Following the quarterly-planning workflow, I can see top customer requests are dark mode (18 votes) and CSV export (15 votes). Let me check your Q1 draft.

tool_call: contentManager_readContent
arguments: {
  "context": {
    "sessionId": "session_1731052000000_a1b2c3d4e",
    "workspaceId": "ws_1731052000000_r0adm4p1q",
    "sessionDescription": "Reading Q1 draft plan",
    "sessionMemory": "Loaded roadmap, Q1 has 3 features drafted, capacity for 8-10 total",

    "primaryGoal": "Plan Q1 feature prioritization",
    "subgoal": "Review drafted features"
  },
  "filePath": "Roadmap/Q1-2026-Draft/features.md"
}
